title: Something is not like the other

embed.description: This is a W ORK I N P ROGRESS POST.] [ Status: The PBE currently still down for maintenance.] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle!

body: Jhin's right eye in the splash art is red, in the summoner icon it is blue. Or is it something with him being an artist?

replies.body: Maybe the icon could be him looking in a mirror?

> [{quoted}](name=McDigits,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5FOcIcEQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-28T19:42:50.827+0000)
>
> Jhin&#039;s right eye in the splash art is red, in the summoner icon it is blue. Or is it something with him being an artist?

Oh no bro, but how special snowflakes going to deal with "surrender". I mean you are forcing them to play worse than they usually do ya know... and the feelings, didn't you know that online games aint supposed to be competitive and aggressive, it should be some alike Japanese-romance anime. [sarcasm].

hehe what to say.
